fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Ember** - Attack your target, this will clean their role and will, if they survive, they will be burning and will receive an Unstoppable cleaning attack the next night. (25 uses)
- Use an ability from any other role. (1 use, +1 use at the start of Night 4)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are lynched, you may choose (# of Alive players / 5, Rounded Up) players to deliver an Unstoppable attack to the following night.
- You may only use Ember at Night 1, after Night 1, It will lose all its uses.
